name: PoP The Ballons
description:
PoP The Balloons is a cool action game very easy and intuitive to play, but it will be hard to stop playing.
Hit with your finger the blowing up balloons on the screen, came on don’t let them vanish away! you have just 60 second to pop all points! so focus on all your senses and on your extraordinary a sight! Now get out all your power against the balloons! Came on hurry up!
Watch out the colors ballons, white give more points than the others.
Enjoy popping ballons the more you can!
